overview: Check out the latest from Jean Noel Rene Clair, Dark Cruising! Featuring the hottest guys in action from France!  If you have fantasized about it... Dark Cruising has it! A special DVD that will rough you up and give you the filthiest ride of your life. Dimly lit dark rooms filled with glory holes and men looking to fulfil their underground sexual desires. The 9 guys in this film live by one rule: "If you want it... take it!"
title: Dark Cruising
